data.persona: I am a slithering snake.  I hide in the royal barn.  One time the barnkeeper saw me.  He tried to kill me and alerted the guards.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance to the Pine trees.
Very tall and towering pine trees that create a dark canopy of shade. Long skinny trees sway in the sky from the soft breeze. Pine needles scatter the ground like plush carpet.
There's a weed, a needle, a grass, a Flower, and a tree here.
The hiker and the person are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will remove the bag of herbs so I can eat them.
data.mid_motivation: The herbs include strong ingredients that will make me venomous.
data.long_motivation: The barnkeeper will steer clear of me if he sees I am venomous.
